About Transistor

Radio app for Android

Version 0.9 ("Young Americans")

Transistor is a barebones app for listening to radio programs over the internet. The App stores stations a files on your devices external memory. Look for files of type m3u within /Android/data/Transistor/Collection.

Transistor is free software. It is published under the MIT open source license. You can find download the code from GitHub. GitHub is also a code place to file bugs or even to contribute, if you are interested.

https://github.com/y20k/transistor

https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT
